price: 61. Accursed, they shall be seized wherever found, and killed with a (terrible) slaughter.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
